MintController contract manages minters for a contract that implements the MinterManagerInterface. It lets the owner designate certain addresses as controllers, and these controllers then manage the minters by adding and removing minters, as well as modifying their minting allowance. A controller may manage exactly one minter, but the same minter address may be managed by multiple controllers. MintController inherits from the Controller contract. It treats the Controller workers as minters.","kind":"dev","methods":{"configureController(address,address)":{"params":{"_controller":"The controller to be configured with a worker.","_worker":"The worker to be set for the newly configured controller. _worker must not be a non-zero address. To disable a worker, use removeController instead."}},"configureMinter(uint256)":{"params":{"_newAllowance":"New allowance to be set for minter."}},"constructor":{"params":{"_minterManager":"The address of the minterManager contract."}},"incrementMinterAllowance(uint256)":{"details":"An minter is considered active if minterManager.isMinter(minter) returns true."},"owner()":{"details":"Tells the address of the owner","returns":{"_0":"the address of the owner"}},"removeController(address)":{"params":{"_controller":"The controller to disable."}},"setMinterManager(address)":{"params":{"_newMinterManager":"The address of the new minterManager contract."}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.","params":{"newOwner":"The address to transfer ownership to."}}},"stateVariables":{"minterManager":{"details":"MintController calls the minterManager to execute/record minter management tasks, as well as to query the status of a minter address."}},"title":"MintController","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"configureController(address,address)":{"notice":"Configure a controller with the given worker."},"configureMinter(uint256)":{"notice":"Enables the minter and sets its allowance."},"constructor":"Initializes the minterManager.","decrementMinterAllowance(uint256)":{"notice":"decreases the minter allowance if and only if the minter is currently active. transaction."},"getMinterManager()":{"notice":"gets the minterManager"},"getWorker(address)":{"notice":"Gets the worker at address "dweb:/ipfs/QmaoXMB972J3cSDLtBq3xBo4jLwqD2uzXTwujtSPqkYVhR"]}},"version":1}

params._controller: The controller to be configured with a worker.
params._worker: The worker to be set for the newly configured controller. _worker must not be a non-zero address. To disable a worker, use removeController instead.

params._newAllowance: New allowance to be set for minter.

params._minterManager: The address of the minterManager contract.

incrementMinterAllowance(uint256).details: An minter is considered active if minterManager.isMinter(minter) returns true.

owner().details: Tells the address of the owner

params._newMinterManager: The address of the new minterManager contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

configureController(address,address).notice: Configure a controller with the given worker.

configureMinter(uint256).notice: Enables the minter and sets its allowance.

decrementMinterAllowance(uint256).notice: decreases the minter allowance if and only if the minter is currently active. The controller can safely send a signed decrementMinterAllowance() transaction to a minter and not worry about it being used to undo a removeMinter() transaction.

incrementMinterAllowance(uint256).notice: Increases the minter's allowance if and only if the minter is an active minter.

removeController(address).notice: disables a controller by setting its worker to address(0).
